fields.name: Raise
fields.title: Raise centralizes information on Notion to create org-wide transparency
fields.subtitle: Raise uses powerful technology to pair expert real estate brokers with workplace leaders, helping companies find their perfect workspace. Its team uses Notion to share information, document their goals, and work faster.

fields.name: Anna Lou

fields.title: Ana Chan portrait
fields.description: A portrait of Ana Chan, Raise.io’s chief of staff

fields.jobTitle: Chief of Staff to the CEO

fields.featuredQuote: As a fully hybrid company, Notion makes information accessible wherever our people are — Los Angeles or Palo Alto, Denver or Chicago.

fields.name: Paper
fields.title: Paper ships faster with crystal clear processes on Notion
fields.subtitle: Paper helps every student reach their potential with intensive one-on-one tutoring. With a clearly defined operating process, team hub, and shared working spaces on Notion, complex collaboration is effortless and enjoyable.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion helps us provide a single source of truth and avoid redundant information.

fields.name: Sendbird
fields.title: How Sendbird created company-wide transparency with Notion
fields.subtitle: Sendbird improves user engagement and retention with scalable in-app chat, voice, and video API. Notion helps them catalog knowledge, information, and ideas across the entire company.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion makes information accessible to a much wider audience — solution engineers, sales reps, executives, even the public.

fields.name: Deel
fields.title: How Deel uses Notion to keep its global remote team on the same page
fields.subtitle: Deel is a global payroll and compliance tool to help companies hire remotely. With a fully remote team working out of a number of time zones, Deel relies on Notion to provide a comprehensive, self-directed onboarding experience for its employees.
fields.featuredQuote: Anything that exists in anyone’s brain is recorded in Notion. Someone could join Deel and onboard themselves without ever speaking to anybody.

fields.name: PartnerStack
fields.title: PartnerStack consolidated project management tools into Notion, delivering value to customers faster
fields.subtitle: PartnerStack uses Notion to manage projects across the entire company. They consolidated project management tools into Notion — saving time and money, increasing shipping cadence, and fostering operational clarity.
fields.featuredQuote: We were able to consolidate 5 - 6 tools into Notion and cut 70 seats across other tools — saving us $20,000 per year.

fields.name: Oyster
fields.title: Oyster’s global team stays connected through hyper-scale with documentation in Notion
fields.subtitle: To effectively scale, Oyster uses Notion as its home for all knowledge and documentation so employees everywhere can self-serve information, remained aligned, and push work forward more efficiently (no matter where they’re located).
fields.featuredQuote: Notion enables us to help people be successful no matter where they are.

fields.name: Partiful
fields.title: Partiful’s product team ships more projects by prioritizing, scoping, and executing in Notion
fields.subtitle: Partiful uses Notion to customize its sprint processes, seeing all tasks that relate to every project. This helps them more accurately plan and track work, which is vital for their small, fast-growing team.
fields.featuredQuote: Once we moved all projects into Notion, we were much more accurately able to plan and track our work.

fields.name: Taxfix
fields.title: How Taxfix makes projects transparent and scalable in Notion
fields.subtitle: Taxfix centralizes all project work in Notion. This visibility improved both execution and communication, while also establishing a scalable process to ship projects more efficiently.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion helps us scale from running a few projects to hundreds of projects, and will support us with scaling to thousands of projects.

fields.name: AngelList
fields.title: As AngelList scales, Notion helps keep teams organized, aligned, and moving with speed
fields.subtitle: Notion is how AngelList documents and shares information, from institutional knowledge as part of the onboarding process, to product specs, to meeting notes.
fields.featuredQuote: Without Notion, I’d never be able to run a productive 50-person meeting.

fields.name: Foolproof
fields.title: How Foolproof tore down information siloes — and reclaimed £500,000 a year in saved time
fields.subtitle: Foolproof, a Zensar company, is a digital product company. Its team introduced Notion as part of a knowledge management transformation, centralizing information, ideas, and content.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion being easy to use was a big draw compared to Confluence or SharePoint.

fields.name: Genially
fields.title: Genially tackles cross-functional collaboration with Notion
fields.subtitle: Genially makes creating interactive content a joy. With individual team hubs and shared working spaces on Notion, complex collaboration is effortless and enjoyable.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion feels like working on paper because it's infinitely flexible.

fields.name: Buffer
fields.title: Buffer's distributed team built a digital headquarters in Notion
fields.subtitle: Buffer simplifies social media scheduling and analysis for tens of millions of users. Its team uses Notion to share information, document objectives, and work collaboratively.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion spread on its own. Now we have a Notion wiki for every department.

fields.name: Base10
fields.title: How Base10 uses Notion to power investment decisions that make a difference
fields.subtitle: Base10 Partners does venture capital a little differently — through their Advancement Initiative fund, Base10 invests in top technology companies to help them diversify their cap table and use venture to move money to minority-serving and minority-owned institutions. The team uses Notion to collaborate, share knowledge, and make investment decisions quickly.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion allows us to move quickly on important decisions, in an informed way. The longer we take to move capital to these institutions, the longer it takes to have an equitable system for these institutions.

fields.name: Dott
fields.title: How Dott’s writing culture centralizes knowledge on Notion
fields.subtitle: Dott helps people skip traffic jams, polluted streets, and busy public transport with shared e-scooters and e-bikes. Its team began documenting meetings, processes, and decisions on Notion to create a long-term memory as a foundation for scale.
fields.featuredQuote: Channeling Marie Kondo, we organized our written communication on Notion in a way that works better for everyone.

fields.name: Primer
fields.title: Primer unites its fast-growing teams on Notion
fields.subtitle: Primer integrates dozens of online payment providers into a unified checkout. Its remote-first team uses Notion to organize knowledge, coordinate work, and supercharge growth.
fields.featuredQuote: I can’t imagine life without Notion. How would we structure things? Where would we save everything? Where would teams go?

fields.name: Demodesk
fields.title: Documenting processes spurred Demodesk's growth
fields.subtitle: Demodesk is an online customer meeting platform that automates non-selling tasks, leaving reps free to focus on what matters: selling. Its team rolled out Notion across the organization to kick the company into hypergrowth.
fields.featuredQuote: We collect and share knowledge on Notion. Everything is accessible to people for their personal and professional development.

fields.name: Multiverse
fields.title: How Notion helps Multiverse preserve company culture among rapid growth
fields.subtitle: Multiverse is revolutionizing the world of tabletop role-playing games. They use Notion to build custom processes and systems that show their creative spark and communicate their culture and mission.
fields.featuredQuote: For a startup, information becomes stale quickly. We need a way to document things that’s also easy to update and makes it easy for employees to access what they need.

fields.name: Synctera
fields.title: Synctera’s remote workspace unites a distributed team
fields.subtitle: Synctera unites local banks and emerging fintech startups. Born during the pandemic, they use Notion to plan, execute, and grow their team across the world.
fields.featuredQuote: Everybody genuinely enjoys using Notion. That reinforces a virtuous cycle of people wanting to contribute and use it.

fields.name: Levels Health
fields.title: Levels makes institutional knowledge discoverable with Notion
fields.subtitle: Levels helps you track your health with biowearables. Its team uses Notion to tear down information silos and make company knowledge accessible to every team member.
fields.featuredQuote: Discoverability is why we switched to Notion. I can find and access every last piece of content created within the company.

fields.name: ImmigrationHelp.org
fields.title: How ImmigrationHelp.org uses Notion to reach more people in need
fields.subtitle: ImmigrationHelp.org helps make the US immigration process easy, safe, and free for low-income individuals. They use Notion as their operating system to mobilize resources and scale their impact.
fields.featuredQuote: Before, it was so hard to stay on top of fundraising. Now that we use Notion, we've raised 100,000 dollars just in the last year.

fields.name: Nathan Maingard
fields.title: Nathan Maingard powers his creative empire with Notion
fields.subtitle: Modern troubadour Nathan Maingard tells stories in many different ways — podcasts, films, songs, written words. With so many different mediums, there’s a lot of logistics to organize before he can start producing content. Notion cuts out the busy work so that Nate can focus on his craft.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion is the central place where all my thoughts, ideas, and work come together.

fields.name: Capgemini
fields.title: How Capgemini codifies the art of applied innovation with Notion
fields.subtitle: Capgemini’s Applied Innovation Exchange (AIE) team helps organizations apply and sustain innovation across their digital portfolio of products and services, so it made sense to do the same internally. They needed a central place to codify the knowledge and work of their innovation team. The answer? Notion. Now the team can access information, identify progress and patterns, and innovate more efficiently.
fields.featuredQuote: In Notion, both our team and leadership can understand what people are doing without having to constantly ask for updates.

fields.name: iTech
fields.title: iTech Media’s shared workspace keeps daily work connected to their company goals
fields.subtitle: iTech Media is a UK tech company, building products to help people make smart choices online. In Notion, their autonomous teams can work independently while staying aligned to the company’s mission.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion means I no longer need to go to three or four different tools to complete one task. Everything is one place.

fields.name: Chipper Cash
fields.title: Chipper Cash drives more intentional work with Notion
fields.subtitle: Chipper Cash helps three million people send and receive money across Africa and beyond. Its global team adopted a culture of documentation on Notion to cut unnecessary meetings and produce a single source of truth for every idea, task, and project.
fields.featuredQuote: We don't have a separate to-do manager, writing platform, and project management tool. It’s all on Notion.

fields.name: Pleo
fields.title: Pleo’s asynchronous collaboration empowers people to work more thoughtfully
fields.subtitle: Pleo helps teams across Europe simplify spending with smart company cards. They use Notion to break free from disruptive in-office work traditions like synchronous standups and immediate decision-making. Now, people can pause, think, and work more thoughtfully.
fields.featuredQuote: Instead of attending project syncs, people share information via Notion. It makes a lot of our meetings obsolete.

fields.name: Axios Sports
fields.title: How Axios Sports builds its daily newsletter in Notion
fields.subtitle: Axios Sports distills the entire sports world into a newsletter that thousands of fans receive every single day. To keep all the sources, writing, and deadlines organized, the team uses Notion as its information and execution hub.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion makes it incredibly easy to see what we have on tap for the following day's newsletter, plus plan the weeks and months ahead.

fields.name: Mixpanel
fields.title: Mixpanel's engineering roadmap keeps its distributed team biased towards action
fields.subtitle: Mixpanel helps companies understand how customers are using their products. The engineering team built their roadmap on Notion to keep everyone informed about the context, goals, and progress of projects.
fields.featuredQuote: The concepts of blocks and pages and databases made sense to me as an engineer. They tickled my design sensibilities — it just felt nice.

fields.name: Argyle
fields.title: Argyle's custom workflows fuel a new kind of startup
fields.subtitle: Argyle is making employment data easier than ever to access, with user consent. From day one, the team wrote their own playbook, raising $20 million with a pitch deck built entirely in Notion. With the flexibility to build custom tools for their every need, Argyle sets a new precedent for startup growth.
fields.featuredQuote: Investors actually thanked us for sending them memos in Notion. They really enjoyed how simple and intuitive it was to navigate through all that information.

fields.name: Match
fields.title: How Match Group's decision-making framework yields delightful products
fields.subtitle: +1 Labs, the innovation lab at Match Group (Tinder, Hinge, Match, OkCupid), is dedicated to creating meaningful connections around the world. The team uses Notion to stay focused on the right ideas, the right feedback, and the right goals, all in one place.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion is a workspace that adapts to your needs. It's as minimal or as powerful as you need it to be.

fields.name: Smartnews (English)
fields.title: How SmartNews keeps information flowing to power a global team
fields.subtitle: SmartNews collects and delivers a variety of daily news that expands your interests. Its global team, spanning Japan to America, built the ultimate digital office in Notion, housing everything from company policies to team wikis and project tracking. With a space to document every decision, the company stays nimble during rapidly changing times.
fields.featuredQuote: After we moved to Notion, we saw a big shift in the way we work. Writing in other tools felt temporary, but Notion's nested structure makes it easier to build documentation that will last.

fields.name: Codecademy
fields.title: Codecademy takes cross-functional project management to the next level with Notion
fields.subtitle: Codecademy is on a mission to help anyone learn to code. Obsessed with accessibility, they look for the same quality in their tools. With Notion, Codecademy invites all stakeholders into each other’s processes, projects, and insights to work better together.
fields.featuredQuote: Now that we’re using Notion, everyone involved in a project has visibility into things like changes in scope and other status updates.

fields.name: Headspace
fields.title: Headspace’s product design team stays mission-focused with Notion
fields.subtitle: The product design team behind meditation app Headspace is paving the way for mindful design. With a forum for collaboration, a living design system, and a clear mission all organized with Notion's Enterprise plan, the team stays laser focused on innovating thoughtful user experiences.
fields.featuredQuote: Our design system in Notion is not a deck. It's not something that's going to fall off. It's living, accessible, and open.

fields.name: Noah Sneider
fields.title: Journalist Noah Sneider brings stories to life with Notion
fields.subtitle: Noah Sneider is quite literally writing history. Whether he’s covering Japan’s changing leadership or the impact of COVID-19 on Japanese rituals, his stories bring fact, analysis, and critical thought to an international audience. With Notion, Noah connects the many moving parts of his writing process in one place so that he never misses a detail.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion has become the single home for all of the wandering parts of my work life. A kind of landing place, refuge, master notebook for my thoughts, scribblings, and work processes.

fields.name: Ola King
fields.title: Project manager Ola King uses Notion to make progress on every great idea
fields.subtitle: Ola King has project management down pat, whether it's in his role at SEO software leader Moz or for his many personal initiatives. One of his recent projects, Black Root, has become a popular resource library for and to support the Black community — conceived, built, and launched entirely in Notion. No matter what he's working on, Ola's Notion setup removes all organizational overhead so he can focus on getting things done.
fields.featuredQuote: I went from struggling to manage one project to managing multiple projects every day. It's like my superpower.

fields.name: Scott Belsky
fields.title: Adobe Chief Product Officer Scott Belsky turns ideas into action with Notion
fields.subtitle: Scott Belsky built his career on creativity. Known for founding design portfolio platform Behance, he now leads Adobe's Creative Cloud, serves as a product advisor and angel to many of today's top startups, and teaches the business of creativity as a speaker and writer. For Scott, everything begins with an idea — and organizing all his thoughts in Notion helps him connect the dots and drive innovation.
fields.featuredQuote: If the most creative people spent a little less time on ideas and a little more on organizing the ideas they've already got, they would make more of an impact. And that's where Notion comes in.

fields.name: Luri Lee
fields.title: Freelance marketer Luri Lee manages personal and professional projects in Notion
fields.subtitle: Luri Lee has a lot going on — she's a freelance marketer, content creator, and avid traveler. With Notion, she keeps all her initiatives on track, whether she's managing her personal life, like her budget, or building her business.
fields.featuredQuote: I had so much information scattered across so many tools. Now everything's together in Notion.

fields.name: Karrot
fields.title: Karrot's company wiki keeps its team united and organized during rapid growth
fields.subtitle: Karrot is South Korea's hyperlocal, community marketplace that provides a way for neighbors to buy and sell goods as well as share information about their neighborhood. With Notion, they onboard employees, keep them connected and attract the best talent to support their expanding business.
fields.featuredQuote: After a week, I was able to figure out almost everything about our company. Notion shrank the learning curve.

fields.name: Crowdcast
fields.title: Crowdcast's operating system drives remote collaboration
fields.subtitle: Crowdcast helps creators host online events and connect with their communities. Its fully remote team created a digital "office" in Notion so that everyone runs on the same processes and principles.
fields.featuredQuote: Most task management apps — like Clickup or Trello — are just pointing to the work that lives scattered in other places. In Notion, all the work lives side by side.

fields.name: Monica Lim
fields.title: English coach and working mom Monica Lim's digital planner keeps all the details straight
fields.subtitle: Monica Lim is an English consultant for high-powered people, from PR professionals to directors of top Korean beauty companies. With dozens of clients, she needs to keep their lesson plans and reading material organized and accessible. On top of that, she's a mom of two. Both her consulting business and family's schedule live in Notion so she can keep track of all the moving pieces.
fields.featuredQuote: When I used Google Drive, I duplicated work because information took so long to find. In Notion, I can easily visualize my entire workspace — and my clients love that all their sessions and resources are organized.

fields.name: Branch
fields.title: Branch's living documentation system propels enterprise growth
fields.subtitle: Branch helps companies measure the performance of the links they use across channels on mobile — from emails to ads. As its engineering team manages an increasingly complex system, their documentation in Notion keeps them aligned.
fields.featuredQuote: People actually enjoy writing documentation in Notion. The whole team is more productive because the information we're looking for is easier to access.

fields.name: SOCAR
fields.title: SOCAR's documentation helps engineers learn from each other
fields.subtitle: SOCAR is the largest car-sharing platform in South Korea. Its data team uses Notion to share, grow, and track the progress of projects so the company can make effective, data-driven decisions.
fields.featuredQuote: Before Notion, it was hard to track why something was done and how it was done. Now it's so much easier to document what you're doing and discuss how to improve our processes.

fields.name: Thomas Frank
fields.title: YouTuber Thomas Frank built his business on this video production process
fields.subtitle: Thomas Frank's productivity videos are watched by nearly 2 million subscribers. For every video, he writes scripts, collects b-roll and manages distribution so that every video is high quality and finds the right audience. Notion helps him and his growing team organize all these moving parts, freeing up more time for him to focus on the creative work.

fields.name: Thomas Frank
fields.creatorDescription: Hi! I'm Thomas Frank and I'm a huge Notion nerd. I run Thomas Frank Explains, a Notion education channel with more than 200,000 subscribers on YouTube. I also make templates, and I'm working on an ultra-powerful web clipper for Notion called Flylighter!

fields.featuredQuote: Our Notion database reduces the amount of money and time it takes to get gear, crew, and actors into one place.

fields.name: Typeform
fields.title: Typeform's product team turns research into a better user experience
fields.subtitle: Typeform lets anyone create beautiful, interactive forms online. Its product team uses Notion to document user research, feedback, and ideas so all teams can base their work in what people actually want.
fields.featuredQuote: No one knew where anything was, so different teams were building different plans. Now, we have one place in Notion where it's all written down.

fields.name: Alex MacCaw
fields.title: Founder Alex MacCaw wrote his first book in Notion — here's why
fields.subtitle: As Co-founder & CEO of business intelligence company Clearbit, Alex MacCaw has a lot going on at once. Yet — between running his company, managing his team and crafting essays — he found time to write a book on management. When choosing where to write it, Notion's minimalist design spoke to him, enabling the degree of focus he needed.
fields.featuredQuote: I love having the ability to both organize and write in Notion. Specifically, the writing interface has been key for my thought process.

fields.name: Swapna Krishna
fields.title: Science writer Swapna Krishna’s project management system
fields.subtitle: As a freelance writer, Swapna Krishna spends her days writing about space, science, technology and — sometimes — Star Trek. Besides creating up to 7 pieces of content a week, she’s also balancing the business of writing: deadlines, invoices, notes, travel. The project management system she built in Notion helps her organize all her ongoing work.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion has truly revolutionized the way I'm able to work because I can see everything I'm working on at once, and know what it is I have to do.

fields.name: Ceci Saia
fields.title: Travel blogger Ceci Saia uses notes to turn ideas into adventure
fields.subtitle: Hundreds of thousands of subscribers count on Ceci Saia for detailed, honest reviews of her travel experiences. The Spain-based travel blogger takes dozens of domestic and international trips per year, producing videos, blogs and city guides about her journeys. She uses Notion as a home for every thought, before, during, and after her trips.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion is the place where I gather anything at any stage, like an idea for a trip or things I'm discovering along the way.

fields.name: Tommy Barav
fields.title: Entrepreneur Tommy Barav built a second brain in Notion
fields.subtitle: As the founder of Supertools, a company using AI to help people use their time more effectively, Tommy Barav made productivity his business. To no surprise, self-improvement is important in his personal life, too. With Notion, Tommy has a custom productivity and improvement system that connects and tracks all his goals in one spot.
fields.featuredQuote: I can create my own productivity tools in Notion.

fields.name: Anabella, Corbin, & Temirlan
fields.title: Three personal websites, all built with Notion
fields.subtitle: Anabella, Corbin, and Temirlan all created Notion pages and made them accessible to anyone online — a resume, portfolio, and complete agency website. Other website makers were too cumbersome and hard to update. Now, they're using Notion pages that are easily customized and distributed with a single click.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion is like a set of building blocks. I love being able to show what I want to show, and display it in any format I want.

fields.name: Amira Yahyaoui
fields.title: Activist Amira Yahyaoui's structure for supreme organization
fields.subtitle: Amira Yahyaoui values organization. She's a Tunisian refugee, exiled from her home at 17, who started a globally-renowned nonprofit to fight for government accountability, and now a startup helping students apply for financial aid. Amira needed one place to control her how-do-you-get-all-that-done-in-24-hours life. Notion is her organizational framework.
fields.featuredQuote: I love to use Notion's calendar because you don't need to build a tracker on top of it. The fact that everything is in one place is such a huge advantage.

fields.name: Apploi
fields.title: Apploi's project management system helps engineers focus
fields.subtitle: Apploi helps employers recruit at high volumes by enabling applicants to stand out. The system they built in Notion keeps the multi-faceted engineering team sprinting, and the whole company informed of their work.
fields.featuredQuote: Because of what Notion does for us...we're able to get more work done without calling in product managers.

fields.name: Pitch
fields.title: Pitch's marketing system keeps output high and quality consistent
fields.subtitle: After founding task juggernaut Wunderlist, Christian Reber is back with Pitch, making presentation creation more collaborative. Notion, its pick for project management, proves especially helpful for the marketing team.
fields.featuredQuote: If someone shares an idea with the marketing team, Notion helps us make sure that it has the right context so we don’t have to go back and forth so many times to get it right.

fields.name: Figma
fields.title: Figma’s knowledge base keeps everyone informed and aligned
fields.subtitle: Figma is a collaborative design tool. Notion brings product, operations, HR, and customer support together in one shared space — and allows each team to customize their workflow.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion’s ease of use is one of its hallmarks. It helps you visually navigate content and remember where something is.

fields.name: Loom
fields.title: Loom’s communication hub unites its remote team
fields.subtitle: R&D and go-to-market teams at companies like HubSpot, Rippling & Square use Loom to communicate more effectively with quick, instantly shareable video messages. Notion is the communication system for Loom’s remote team. With Enterprise plan features that unlock more control and customization, Loom has all it needs to keep the company synced at all times.

fields.title: Vinay Hiremath -- Co-founder and Head of Engineering at Loom

fields.featuredQuote: Notion continues to be the easiest way to get information centralized somewhere and shout it out to someone else. For us, that’s extremely important because half our team is remote.

fields.name: Blinkist
fields.title: Blinkist’s hiring process unlocks growth with quality
fields.subtitle: Blinkist makes downtime a learning opportunity, providing insights from best-selling books in bite-sized formats. In Notion, the company's recruiters built a repeatable system that ensures a great candidate experience.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion helps us make sure our processes are all set up, and everything for kicking off a hiring process is available in one place.

fields.name: MetaLab
fields.title: Design agency MetaLab keeps client work organized & collaborative
fields.subtitle: MetaLab is a product design firm with a team that works remotely around the world, serving clients like Amazon and Tinder. Multiple ongoing projects made docs unfindable — now, they're organized and accessible in Notion.
fields.featuredQuote: We got rid of nearly a dozen different tools because of what Notion does for us.

fields.name: Boxed
fields.title: Boxed's wiki boosts speed and alignment
fields.subtitle: Boxed sells household goods in bulk online. Sounds simple, but it requires a ton of logistics. Their Notion wiki puts all their info a click away, makes it collaborative, and helps them document process so it can scale.
fields.featuredQuote: Notion's become a team-wide FAQ for us. More people can immediately find what they need.

fields.body: If the most creative people spent a little less time on ideas and a little more on organizing the ideas they've already got, they would make more of an impact. And that's where Notion comes in.
Notion has been revolutionary for us. I've been doing this for 15 years and I've used a lot of different issue management tools and nothing's come close to this in terms of power.
Every day is a new canvas that we can structure however we want. We can always record information differently depending on what's most helpful.
The power of the flexibility is mind blowing. It transforms the way you work. You can create so many layers of knowledge that go as deep as you want.
Notion saved our life given the complexity of what we're doing. There was so much replication and no single source of truth.
We can now keep everyone up to date across the whole team. It helps keep everyone at the right level of awareness and with our speed of execution.
Notion is an organized information repository for my brain as I explore emerging technologies. It helps me catalog my research and clarify my thinking on an investment.
We had a serious wiki issue. No one place where everything lived, and it was a scattered mess. Notion became the wiki and knowledge center to rule them all.
Notion is so good it makes a devilishly complex problem seem simple.

I think of Notion as the bones of our company knowledge. Google Docs doesn't provide that because it's not as easy to navigate all of the different things you have going on. Now it's our absolute source of knowledge and project management.
We're a distributed team so we can't do many meetings. Notion gives us all the same information so we can keep moving.
You can tell the huge amount of effort that went into keeping Notion so simple. They understand that you can solve a lot of problems with one tool.
We use Notion across Sales, Marketing, Product, and Engineering. You can replace Google, Trello, Dropbox Paper, Guru, and Confluence all in one tool.
